mobileAppsData.description: Chart a course for action and adventure in the exotic seas of the Caribbean. With new ports to explore and new goods to trade in, this sequel to Tradewinds has hours of challenging game play.
mobileAppsData.title: Trade Winds 2

mobileAppsData.description: The survival of the Angry Birds is at stake. Dish out revenge on the green pigs who stole the Birds’ eggs. Use the unique destructive powers of the Angry Birds to lay waste to the pigs’ fortified castles. Angry Birds features hours of gameplay, challenging physics-based castle demolition, and lots of replay value. Each of the 120 levels requires logic, skill, and brute force to crush the enemy. Protect wildlife, or play Angry Birds!
mobileAppsData.title: Angry Birds

mobileAppsData.description: Play the famous Helicopter Game on your phone. Tap the screen or press the spacebar for the Copter to go up, release to go down.
mobileAppsData.title: The Helicopter Game

mobileAppsData.description: Defend your cities against nuclear attack by shooting missiles at your enemies. Don’t forget to take the delay of impact into account.
mobileAppsData.title: Nuclear Attack

mobileAppsData.description: Enjoy the classic game of Reversi, also known as Othello&#8482. Choose from three different game themes.
mobileAppsData.title: Reversi

mobileAppsData.description: Play correspondence chess against any Chess.com members. Go at your own speed on your own schedule without worrying about losing your phone connection or running out of time.
mobileAppsData.title: Chess.com

mobileAppsData.description: Wage an all-out mafia war with over 65 criminal missions plus cool cars and hired guns. And if you play Mobsters on Facebook<sup>®</sup> or MySpace, you can play your existing game when you're on the go.
mobileAppsData.title: Mobsters: Big Apple

mobileAppsData.description: Test your knowledge of the most awesome decade. With questions written by writers from the hit VH1 series I Love the 80s, this game is sure to challenge even the most bodacious trivia buffs.
mobileAppsData.title: VH1's I Love the 80s Trivia

mobileAppsData.description: Entertain young children while teaching them about animal sounds. Listen to sounds from bears to wolves and guess what animal makes that noise.
mobileAppsData.title: Rockus Animals

mobileAppsData.description: If you like cute bubble poppers, match-3 games, or just a bit of fun, this classic puzzle-bubble game is for you. Clear the play balls from the viewport before the top wall comes down.
mobileAppsData.title: Amulet Light

mobileAppsData.description: This free, limited-time demo puts a new spin on the original. Three new game modes, including Cascade, Fusion, and Sticky, make Tetris Mania a must-have for Tetris fans.
mobileAppsData.title: Tetris Mania

mobileAppsData.description: Play a hand of solitaire when you're stuck in line, waiting for a friend, or just have a few minutes. It's so much faster and easier than real cards that you might never use a deck again.
mobileAppsData.title: Klondike Solitaire

mobileAppsData.description: Combine the strategy and competition of Texas Hold 'Em with the intellectual challenge of classic word games. It's a fast-paced, multiplayer online game you can take with you.
mobileAppsData.title: Word Ace

mobileAppsData.description: Free, limited-time demo of the classic dice game. Travel the globe, meet characters, challenge them to a game, roll the dice, and be the first to score a Yahtzee.
mobileAppsData.title: Yahtzee

mobileAppsData.description: Your favorite classic row-making game. Enjoy full touchscreen controls and 3 unique game play modes so you can play alone, against your online friends, or using Pass 'N Play.
mobileAppsData.title: Connect 4

mobileAppsData.description: Find the connected regions of bubbles that are the same color and pop them. The more bubbles you pop at once, the more points you get. Four different modes means hours of fun.
mobileAppsData.title: Bubbles!

mobileAppsData.description: Over 1000 hand-crafted Sudoku puzzles. Take notes in squares when you're not sure about your answer. Quit and come back whenever you want—you can pick up right where you left off.
mobileAppsData.title: Sudoku!

mobileAppsData.description:
Sharpen your mind with a fun, scientifically tested brain-training game. This mental workout can help you think faster, improve reaction
times, and speed up
cognitive processes.
mobileAppsData.title: Speed Brain

mobileAppsData.description:
Play the classic card game that emphasizes teamwork and strategy. Three computer players, four game
modes, and various game
play options provide
hours of entertainment.
mobileAppsData.title: Spades

mobileAppsData.description: Play a Vegas-style video poker machine on your phone. Options include Jacks or Better, Deuces Wild, and seven different bet levels.
mobileAppsData.title: Video Poker

mobileAppsData.description: Have fun playing the classic board game against the computer or with friends. Choose from a variety of board themes and play styles.
mobileAppsData.title: Checkers

mobileAppsData.description: Enjoy the classic game with great graphics. Play against the computer and challenge yourself by resetting the preferences to increasingly difficult levels.
mobileAppsData.title: Chess

mobileAppsData.description: Just like the old pen-and-paper game. Draw lines to connect dots in a grid to make boxes. The player with the most boxes at the end wins. Play with a friend or against the computer.
mobileAppsData.title: Dot Game

mobileAppsData.description: Test your memory and speed skills with this easy-to-play yet addictive game. Repeat the patterns for as long as you can. The faster you complete each one, the more points you get.
mobileAppsData.title: Ditto

mobileAppsData.description: Play dice and race the computer to 10,000 points. Easy to learn and quick to play, it's a game of skill and luck in which the best player prevails.
mobileAppsData.title: Zilch Lite

mobileAppsData.description: Enjoy the popular photo-hunt game featuring photos of space. Find the five differences before time runs out. Then compare your score with PicHunt users around the world.
mobileAppsData.title: PicHunt - Space Explorer

mobileAppsData.description: A different spin on the timeless game of Hangman. Guess the word correctly to diffuse the bomb, or watch it explode if you fail. Play with a friend or against the computer.
mobileAppsData.title: Deadman

mobileAppsData.description: In this classic game, control the snake with the keyboard or a flick of your finger. Eat items without running into walls and remember to avoid those bombs.
mobileAppsData.title: Snake

mobileAppsData.description: Play a game of tic-tac-toe against the computer or a friend. You can set the computer's skill level to make it challenging for any player.
mobileAppsData.title: Tic Tac Toe for webOS

mobileAppsData.description: Send a polar bear sliding across the ice in this fun and whimsical game. See how many bears you can flick into the hole and try to beat your top score.
mobileAppsData.title: Polar Bowling

mobileAppsData.description: This fantasy-themed role-playing game lets you enjoy imaginary quests, endure epic fights, and utilize weapons and armor in pursuit of conquering the realm.
mobileAppsData.title: Dungeon Quest

mobileAppsData.description: Choose lottery numbers based on historical patterns of winning numbers. Just select a state and the lottery game you'd like to play, then tap a button to generate numbers.<sup>2</sup>
mobileAppsData.title: Lottery Generator

mobileAppsData.description: Find the five differences between two similar photos before time runs out. There are 45 sets of images in three categories. Play and compare scores on the  global leaderboard.
mobileAppsData.title: Photo Fun: Spot the Difference

mobileAppsData.description:
Identify the five missing pieces of a picture before time runs out. Choose from 30 levels in three categories. Play and compare scores on the
global leaderboard.
mobileAppsData.title: Photo Fun: Spot the Missing Pieces

mobileAppsData.description: This best-selling game acts like real air hockey. Control the mallet with your finger and be the first to score seven goals. Choose from easy to challenging play levels.
mobileAppsData.title: Air Hockey

mobileAppsData.description: Play Texas Hold 'Em against thousands of real people and see who can rack up the biggest stack of chips. A friend list and in-game chat make it easy and fun to play anytime, anywhere.
mobileAppsData.title: Card Ace

mobileAppsData.description: Test your ability to form words from a set of letters. Games are automatically saved so you can pick up where you left off. The paid version features 2300 levels.
mobileAppsData.title: Word Whirl

mobileAppsData.description: Here's a word-search game with a twist. Find as many high-scoring words as you can before time runs out. Stuck? Just shake the phone for a new set of letters.
mobileAppsData.title: Wobble Words

mobileAppsData.description: It's up to you to parachute your troopers to safety. Lean your device from side to side to adjust your troopers as they fall, but it's not as easy as it looks to achieve a perfect 100-point landing.
mobileAppsData.title: Paratrooper

mobileAppsData.description: Perfect your aim and strategy in this fantasy pool game. Sink balls by kicking them into crystals, judge your kick strength, and use magnets and force fields to figure out impossible shots.
mobileAppsData.title: Roll Quest

mobileAppsData.description: Can you seamlessly arrange all seven polygons to form the desired figure? Sharpen your spatial and shape recognition abilities while having fun with this dissection puzzle game.
mobileAppsData.title: Tangram

mobileAppsData.description: Direct the ball into the goal by tilting your device. The angle of your tilt determines where the ball goes and how fast it rolls.
mobileAppsData.title: Topple Ball

mobileAppsData.description: Tap the rabbits to shoot them but be careful—don't shoot the zombie rabbits or get blown up by rabbits carrying bombs.
mobileAppsData.title: Wabbit Hunt

mobileAppsData.description: Remember Bop It from back in the day? Now you can have the same excitement on your phone. Challenge the clock or play up to four players at the same time.
mobileAppsData.title: Tap Flick Slide It

footnotes.text: 2. For entertainment use only. There is no guarantee that the numbers generated will be the winning numbers.
